Visit ancient civilizations such as Egypt or Rome to witness historical events firsthand.
Explore the future to see how technology has evolved and how society has changed.
Visit different parts of the world to experience different cultures and lifestyles.
Meet famous historical figures such as Leonardo da Vinci or Mahatma Gandhi.
Go back in time and prevent a catastrophic event from happening, such as the assassination of Archduke Franz Ferdinand or the sinking of the Titanic.
